name: autowrap_at_region_bottom
description: Auto-wrap at bottom of scroll region triggers scroll within region only; rows outside are untouched
comment: Fill A-E in rows 0-4. DECSTBM(2,5) → region rows 1-4. CUP(5,1) → (4,0). Write '12345' fills row 4, pending_wrap. Write 'X' triggers wrap → scroll region up. Row 0=A untouched, row 1←C, row 2←D, row 3←12345, row 4=X.
